roleset.name: investigate, figure out
roleset.note: ANALYZE-V NOTES: A singular lack of decent examples for this verb. (from analyze.01-v)
ANALYSIS-N NOTES: Roleset based on verb entry analyze.01, OntoNotes grouping analysis-n senses 1, 3,& 4; maps to VN class assessment-34.1. Framed by Claire. (from analysis.01-n)
ANALYZE-N NOTES: Based on sentences in nouns-9998. Comparison to anaylze.01-v. VN class assessment-34.1. Framed by Katie. (from analyze.01-n)

example.name: analyze this!
example.text: Mr. Phelan said, [0] ``It [*EXP*-2]will take another day or two'' [*] to analyze who [*T*-1] was buying and selling Friday.
example.arg: who [*T*-1] was buying and selling Friday

example.name: NP only, all arguments
example.text: Mr. Laband 's analysis of time values

example.name: Arg 0 and MNR
example.text: His clever analysis proved that the painting was a fraud.

example.name: All arguments
example.text: My analysis of Conrad's 'Heart of Darkness' was published.

example.name: one more with both args
example.text: His analysis of the voting behavior of his fellow New Yorkers
example.arg: of the voting behavior of his fellow New Yorkers
